title: i've been asking for help on riot support for over 12 hours now
body:
i've been asking for help on riot support for **over 12 hours** now, i've resubmitted my question another time and i'm only getting ignored i've tried to solve my problem myself with the aid of the **Hex-tech repair tool** now  i have **10 leaver buster games**. this is getting ridiculous and i'm really losing patience no response on either ticket tho ive asked for human help in every way the site allows.

**can anyone  in riot support actually support me please?**

replies.body: I don't think anyone is trying to ignore you, but our tech guys might be a bit backed up and haven't had a chance to respond yet.  Toss me your ticket number, and I'd be happy to check on the status for you!
